  • just a warning, but followed by the same behavior as the CPU.

body:
as a user, some solutions that would make me really happy:

- an exception from both CPU and GPU saying that infinity is unsupported is multinomial. tracking down the `CUDNN_STATUS_EXECUTION_FAILED` back to multinomial was actually really difficult (as a beginner).
- just a warning, but followed by the same behavior as the CPU.
- add a `logits` parameter to multinomial allowing people to use logits rather than probabilities, making it less likely that people will run into this problem.
